channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Mayorkas names panel to conduct review of Trump assassination attempt
item.description: The announcement comes in the wake of the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump last Saturday.
item.content:encoded:
The announcement comes in the wake of the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump last Saturday.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: NPR Washington Desk

item.title: Want to know what Biden said when he dropped out? The full letter is here
item.description: Read the full text of President Biden's letter withdrawing from the race to be the Democratic nominee and his endorsement of Vice President Harris to represent the party instead.
item.content:encoded:
Read the full text of President Biden's letter withdrawing from the race to be the Democratic nominee and his endorsement of Vice President Harris to represent the party instead.

(Image credit: Tom Brenner)
item.dc:creator: Jeongyoon Han

item.title: Biden drops out of 2024 reelection race, endorses Harris for nominee
item.description: President Biden announced that he will discontinue his campaign to seek a second term in the White House, throwing the Democratic race for 2024 wide open.
item.content:encoded:
President Biden announced that he will discontinue his campaign to seek a second term in the White House, throwing the Democratic race for 2024 wide open.

(Image credit: Brendan Smialowski)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Sen. Tim Kaine calls Biden's decision to withdraw 'patriotic'
item.description: Sen. Tim Kaine has been calling for President Biden to step down from the presidential race for weeks, now he's endorsing Vice President Harris.
item.content:encoded: Sen. Tim Kaine has been calling for President Biden to step down from the presidential race for weeks, now he's endorsing Vice President Harris.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: What does President Biden's announcement mean for the GOP?
item.description: Conservative strategist Scott Jennings talks with NPR's Andrew Limbong about what President Biden's withdrawal from the 2024 presidential race means for the GOP.
item.content:encoded: Conservative strategist Scott Jennings talks with NPR's Andrew Limbong about what President Biden's withdrawal from the 2024 presidential race means for the GOP.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: International reaction to President Biden's exit from 2024 race
item.description: Former BBC North American Editor looks at what Biden's withdrawal from the 2024 presidential race means for American allies and adversaries.
item.content:encoded: Former BBC North American Editor looks at what Biden's withdrawal from the 2024 presidential race means for American allies and adversaries.
item.dc:creator: Mary Louise Kelly

item.title: A presidential historian weighs in on Biden's exit
item.description: President Biden's decision to drop out of the 2024 race this late in the election season is a historic moment for presidential politics. NPR's Andrew Limbong chats with historian Timothy Naftali.
item.content:encoded: President Biden's decision to drop out of the 2024 race this late in the election season is a historic moment for presidential politics. NPR's Andrew Limbong chats with historian Timothy Naftali.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: Congresswoman Wasserman Schultz on the way forward for Democrats
item.description: Congresswoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz discusses with NPR's Mary Louise Kelly the path forward for the Democratic party following President Biden's announcement that he will not seek re-election.
item.content:encoded: Congresswoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz discusses with NPR's Mary Louise Kelly the path forward for the Democratic party following President Biden's announcement that he will not seek re-election.
item.dc:creator: Mary Louise Kelly

item.title: Biden drops out of presidential race
item.description: President Biden drops out of the 2024 presidential race, and endorses Vice President Kamal Harris to replace him atop the Democratic ticket.
item.content:encoded: President Biden drops out of the 2024 presidential race, and endorses Vice President Kamal Harris to replace him atop the Democratic ticket.
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Kamala Harris pledges to 'earn and win' the nomination after Biden's endorsement
item.description: After President Biden announced he would no longer seek the Democratic nomination for president, he endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris. Harris said she wants to unite the Democratic Party.
item.content:encoded:
After President Biden announced he would no longer seek the Democratic nomination for president, he endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris. Harris said she wants to unite the Democratic Party.

(Image credit: Patrick Semansky)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram
